description: This file defines the Guest class, representing a guest in an event planning application with properties such as Id, EventId, Email, Name, Status, and timestamps for invitation and response.

classes.name: Guest
classes.description: Represents a guest invited to an event with RSVP status and related properties.

methods.name: set.Id
methods.description: Auto-implemented property for the guest's unique identifier.

methods.name: set.EventId
methods.description: Identifier linking the guest to a specific event.

methods.name: set.Status
methods.description: RSVP status of the guest (Pending, Accepted, Declined).

methods.name: set.InvitedAtUtc
methods.description: Timestamp when the guest was invited, defaulting to current UTC time.
